thread.section_title: Araparts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Araparts.com | araparts.com
thread.title: Joleen Kaps

author: Joleen Kaps
title: Joleen Kaps
text: IM OVER THE MOON IN LOVE WITH THIS STORE. Its really nice to know that there are good people out there looking out for idiots like me who don't know what they are doing ( or looking for) the guy who answered the phones talked to me like a person! I know, shocking. He answered ALL my questions and then took my order. Much to my shock and amazement not only was my critical much needed product free shipping, it got here overnight... On a weekend! (Sat) AND... This company saved me $463. The parts markup at auto zone was huge. I paid $89 out the door free shipping. Its literally crazy. I wish they carried more parts but even when I was told they didn't the clerk didn't hesitate to help me find a place that could help me. I honestly love that clerk.
